hero.title: Dangerous diving - Child gold miners in the Philippines
hero.description: The Philippines has vast deposits of gold. But much of it is mined by children. They alone are slender enough to dive deep into self-dug tunnels, through swamps or down to the seabed. The highly dangerous undertaking puts their lives at risk.

primary.title: 'Social menace:' New House bill bans all POGO hubs
primary.description: Castro described POGOs as a "social menace" and a source of "unimaginable corruption," saying that operators have routinely violated Philippine laws on money laundering, tax evasion and other serious offenses.

secondary.title: More solons want all POGOs closed down
secondary.description: A House leader on Monday warned POGO-politics will doom the country amid a growing clamor for the government to totally ban Philippine Offshore Gaming Operations and declare the industry a national security threat.

secondary.title: Chinese military uniforms in Porac POGO hub authentic but outdated: PAOCC
secondary.description: The Chinese military uniforms discovered by Philippine authorities in the illegal POGO facility in Porac, Pampanga appear to be authentic but are outdated, according to the Presidential Anti-Organized Crime Commission.

secondary.title: Bad for relations: China presses PH to ban Pogos
secondary.description: Beijing urged Manila on Friday to immediately ban online gaming operations, saying these were a “social ill” that was harming the interests of both countries and were being linked to “baseless accusations” and smears against China.

carousel.title: Marcos signs into law Negros Island Region Act
carousel.description: President Ferdinand “Bongbong” Marcos Jr. signed on Thursday, June 13, 2024, a measure for the establishment of the Negros Island Region.

carousel.title: Philippines marks 126th Independence Day
carousel.description: Government officials on Wednesday led the celebration of the Philippines’ 126th Independence Day in several locations.

carousel.title: What's the controversy over the P23-B new Senate building all about?
carousel.description: The pricey Senate building did not only raise the eyebrows of Senate President Chiz Escudero, it also caught the attention of the public

carousel.title: Pentagon ran secret anti-vax campaign to incite fear of China vaccines
carousel.description: The covert effort began under Trump and continued into Biden’s presidency, Reuters found. Health experts say it endangered lives for possible geopolitical gain.
